detected_opportunities.title: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL: CWI DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION
detected_opportunities.description: Cricket West Indies (CWI) invites proposals from highly skilled digital transformation and web development agencies to spearhead a comprehensive Digital Transformation initiative. This project encompasses the strategic redesign and redevelopment of our official website.

yellow_panther_alignment.competitive_advantage: Proven sports federation digital transformation experience

detected_opportunities.title: Manchester United seeking digital transformation partners
detected_opportunities.description: Manchester United is exploring strategic partnerships for digital platform modernization and fan engagement initiatives. Looking for experienced technology partners with sports industry expertise.

detected_opportunities.title: Brooklyn Nets seeking digital transformation partners
detected_opportunities.description: Brooklyn Nets is exploring strategic partnerships for digital platform modernization and fan engagement initiatives. Looking for experienced technology partners with sports industry expertise.

yellow_panther_alignment.competitive_advantage: US sports market experience and NBA knowledge
